pullrequest.title: Fix discarding building editor model and add test

content.raw:
It doesn't crash when exiting :) But I noticed another issue, don't think it's related though:

1. Enter Building Editor

2. Draw a wall

3. File -> Done

4. Delete the newly created `BuildingDefaultName` model (from the world tree, deleting by clicking the model does not delete it - another issue)

5. Enter the Building Editor again

6. Draw a wall - crash with this error:


```
#!c++
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (this->dataPtr->sceneNode) failed in void gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetPosition(const gazebo::math::Vector3&):
```
content.html:
It doesn't crash when exiting :) But I noticed another issue, don't think it's related though:

  1. Enter Building Editor

  2. Draw a wall

  3. File -> Done

  4. Delete the newly created BuildingDefaultName model (from the world tree, deleting by clicking the model does not delete it - another issue)

  5. Enter the Building Editor again

  6. Draw a wall - crash with this error:

***** Internal Program Error - assertion (this->dataPtr->sceneNode) failed in void gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetPosition(const gazebo::math::Vector3&):
